General.Name: Peninsula Group Ltd
General.Description: Peninsula Group Ltd provides credit solutions in Israel. The company offer long term, medium term, import, supplier, equipment, and asset-based financing services. It also provides bridge loans; line of credit; and diamond exchange services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
General.Address: 48th Yehuda Ha-Levi Street, Tel Aviv, Israel
